Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: Oversight - New York City's Women in the Domestic Labor Force - Are They Being Treated Fairly?
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - New York City's Women in the Domestic Labor Force - Are They Being Treated Fairly?

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Resolution supporting the New York State Legislature’s consideration of legislative proposals intended to provide better workplace protections for domestic workers, and urging the vigorous enforcement of all current laws and regulations that provide such protections to such workers.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Oversight - New York City's Women in the Domestic Labor Force - Are They Being Treated Fairly?
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - New York City's Women in the Domestic Labor Force - Are They Being Treated Fairly?

Items.Title: Resolution supporting the New York State Legislature’s consideration of legislative proposals intended to provide better workplace protections for domestic workers, and urging the vigorous enforcement of all current laws and regulations that provide such protections to such workers.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Addabbo, Nelson, Gennaro, Seabrook and Brewer
